title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Trust requires courage, and courage means action. You might struggle to let your guard down with someone who has previously hurt your feelings. Perhaps you start with reaching out to discuss your position and hearing this person's side of the story. Or a self-absorbed friend just shows up on the scene and asks for a favor, ignorant of how they made you feel in the past. Honesty saves time. Compassion and forgiveness are what you must keep on tap for the sake of peace. Actress Meryl Streep said, The great gift of human beings is that we have the power of empathy. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
